text: The Women's Solo event at the 2010 South American Games had the Technical Routine on March 27 at 20:30, and the Free Routine on MArch 28 at 20:30. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Giovana Stephan '''' |Asly Castellanos '''' |Etel Sánchez '''' |} ==Results== ===Technical Routine=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! width=250|Athlete !! width=70|EX !! width=70|OI !! width=70|Pen. !! 50% Points |- |1 || align=left| |42.667 || 43.167 || || 42.917 |- |2 || align=left| |42.167 || 43.000 || || 42.584 |- |3 || align=left| |40.167 || 40.667 || || 40.417 |- |4 || align=left| |39.167 || 39.667 || || 39.417 |- |5 || align=left| |36.167 || 35.667 || || 35.917 |- |6 || align=left| |30.667 || 33.167 || –0.5 || 32.167 |} ===Free Routine=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! width=250|Athlete !! width=70|TM !! width=70|AI !! width=70|Pen. !! 50% Points |- |1 || align=left| |43.833 || 43.000 || || 43.417 |- |1 || align=left| |43.500 || 43.333 || || 43.417 |- |3 || align=left| |41.333 || 40.833 || || 41.083 |- |4 || align=left| |40.167 || 37.833 || || 39.000 |- |5 || align=left| |37.167 || 36.333 || || 36.750 |- |6 || align=left| |32.833 || 33.333 || || 33.083 |} ===Summary=== {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%" style="width:35em;" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! width=250|Athlete !! width=70|TR !! width=70|FR !!
